job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-23T01:32:20.000Z", "description": "

Data Scientist

18 month contract through Kelly Services

Client is in Muskegon MI but open to seeing remote candidates. Preferably in the Eastern timezone to help with working hours.

 Offers competitive compensation and full benefits package


Responsibilities:

\u2022 Big data experience

\u2022 Provide timely response to internal customer inquiries via telephone, business e-mail, meetings, etc. 

\u2022 Perform data analytics using various tools (SAP, BW, Power BI, Python, SAS etc.).

\u2022 Statistic expertise

\u2022 May be responsible for several components of a project or a complex component of a larger project. 

\u2022 Contribute to their team or department by applying their knowledge of one or more functional areas. 

\u2022 Responsible for compiling data from multiple databases to extract market trends, sales forecasts, etc. 

\u2022 Support PAP process, month/quarter end sales monitoring and initiatives.

\u2022 M2M coordination using multiple platforms including EDI, SPEC2000, etc.

\u2022 Perform Customer Master Data maintenance. 

\u2022 Provide General Business Support, as required. 

\u2022 Other projects as assigned by leadership team. 


Qualifications:


\u2022 Fully developed professional with excellent communication and organizational skills and able to work without direct guidance of others.

\u2022 Must be self-motivated with a strong sense of urgency. Should be able to prioritize and balance workload, plan ahead to ensure deadlines/goals are met, and make sound decisions in a fast-paced environment. 

\u2022 Must possess a \u2018customer first\u2019 mindset toward both the client and their customers, always exhibiting the highest level of business support.  

\u2022 Must be able to perform data analytics using various tools (Power BI, SAP, BW, Python, SAS, etc.) 

\u2022 Excellent MS Office Suite skills (Excel /VBA).

\u2022 Bachelor\u2019s degree (4-7 years of experience) or Master\u2019s degree (2- 5 years of experience) in Computer Science or Industrial Engineering.

\u2022 Must be a team player with a passion for excellence.

\u2022 Must maintain excellent attendance record.
